name: Sephvarg
body:
### Hello!
My name is Joseph Vargas, and welcome to my website. I am a Computer Science student at the University of North Texas, a Technical Writer, and a Bassist. The purpose of this website is to be an ongoing project of mine that will help showcase some personal projects and my resume for possible employment, internship, or general contact.

### Contact
If you'd like to contact me, you may email vargman54@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
